content:
AutomationProperties Class

Definition

Provides a means of getting or setting the value of the associated properties of the instance of the AutomationPeer element.

In this Article

public static class AutomationProperties

Remarks

If <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property isn't set, this method returns the Name property.
